name: Private cai be floating market full day tour from HCM city
description: For those who want to see the floating market within one day, this trip is the perfect choice for you. Unlike other operators, we organize this trip every day in small group size from 6 – 16 people to ensure that the tour guide can take care of all the travelers. Joining this tour, visitors can visit the Cai Be floating market, enjoy boat rides through small canals, experience cooking local dishes and biking in the village paths are highlights of the excursion.
